title: Crystal Clear
description: From the front of the book:"A condensed version of this book has appeared in Ladies Home Journal under the title Journey's Eve".Five weeks! And then Paul Saxon was off to Africa. In that time he had to find the girl who claimed to be his fiancee. Then he caught a glimpse of lovely, dark Antonia Wyatt. What happens when a handsome young lord-about-town falls in love with a beautiful commoner? The results are remarkable enough to rattle the skeletons in any eccentric family's closet!
author: Elizabeth Cadell
